verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G3004>say,<s%> as <S%G5550>long<s%> as the <S%G2818>heir<s%> is a <S%G3516>child,<s%> he does not <S%G1308>differ<s%> at <S%G3761>all<s%> from a <S%G1401>slave<s%> although he is <S%G2962>owner<s%> of <S%G3956>everything,<s%>
but he is <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G2012>guardians<s%> and <S%G3623>managers<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G4287>date<s%> <S%G4287>set<s%> by the <S%G3962>father.<s%>

<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we, <S%G3753>while<s%> we were <S%G3516>children,<s%> were <S%G1402>held<s%> in <S%G1402>bondage<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G4747>elemental<s%> <S%G4747>things<s%> of the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

But <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G4138>fulness<s%> of the <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1821>sent<s%> <S%G1821>forth<s%> His <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G1096>born<s%> of a <S%G1135>woman,<s%> <S%G1096>born<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>Law,<s%>

in <S%G2443>order<s%> that He might <S%G1805>redeem<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> that we might <S%G618>receive<s%> the <S%G5206>adoption<s%> as <S%G5206>sons.<s%>

And <S%G3754>because<s%> you are <S%G5207>sons,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1821>sent<s%> <S%G1821>forth<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of His <S%G5207>Son<s%> into our <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> <S%G2896>crying,<s%> "Abba! <S%G5>Father!<s%>"

<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> you are <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> a <S%G1401>slave,<s%> but a <S%G5207>son;<s%> and <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5207>son,<s%> <S%G2532>then<s%> an <S%G2818>heir<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G235>However<s%> at that <S%G5119>time,<s%> when you did not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> you were <S%G1398>slaves<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> which by <S%G5449>nature<s%> are <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G2316>gods.<s%>

But <S%G3568>now<s%> that you have come to <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1161>or<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> to be <S%G1097>known<s%> by <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> is it that you <S%G1994>turn<s%> <S%G1994>back<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to the <S%G772>weak<s%> and <S%G4434>worthless<s%> <S%G4747>elemental<s%> <S%G4747>things,<s%> to <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2309>desire<s%> to be <S%G1398>enslaved<s%> <S%G509>all<s%> <S%G509>over<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>?
You <S%G3906>observe<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> and <S%G3376>months<s%> and <S%G2540>seasons<s%> and <S%G1763>years.<s%>
I <S%G5399>fear<s%> for you, that <S%G4458>perhaps<s%> I have <S%G2872>labored<s%> <S%G1519>over<s%> you in <S%G1500>vain.<s%>
I <S%G1189>beg<s%> of you, <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> as I [am], for I <S%G2532>also<s%> [have become] as you [are.] You have <S%G91>done<s%> me <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G91>wrong;<s%>

but you <S%G3609>know<s%> that it was <S%G1223>because<s%> of a <S%G4561>bodily<s%> <S%G769>illness<s%> that I <S%G2097>preached<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to you the <S%G4387>first<s%> <S%G4387>time;<s%>

and that <S%G3986>which<s%> was a <S%G3986>trial<s%> to you in my <S%G4561>bodily<s%> <S%G4561>condition<s%> you did not <S%G1848>despise<s%> <S%G3761>or<s%> <S%G1609>loathe,<s%> but you <S%G1209>received<s%> me as an <S%G32>angel<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> as <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> [Himself.]

<S%G4226>Where<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> is that <S%G3108>sense<s%> of <S%G3108>blessing<s%> you had? For I <S%G3140>bear<s%> you <S%G3140>witness,<s%> that <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1415>possible,<s%> you would have <S%G1846>plucked<s%> out your <S%G3788>eyes<s%> and <S%G1325>given<s%> them to me.
Have I <S%G5620>therefore<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> your <S%G2190>enemy<s%> by <S%G226>telling<s%> you the <S%G226>truth<s%>?
They <S%G2206>eagerly<s%> <S%G2206>seek<s%> you, not <S%G2573>commendably,<s%> but they <S%G2309>wish<s%> to <S%G1576>shut<s%> you out, in <S%G2443>order<s%> that you may <S%G2206>seek<s%> them.

But it is <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> to be <S%G2206>eagerly<s%> <S%G2206>sought<s%> in a <S%G2570>commendable<s%> <S%G2570>manner,<s%> and not <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> I <S%G3918>am<s%> <S%G3918>present<s%> with you.
My <S%G5043>children,<s%> with <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G5605>am<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> in <S%G5605>labor<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G3445>formed<s%> in you â€“
but I could <S%G2309>wish<s%> to be <S%G3918>present<s%> with you <S%G737>now<s%> and to <S%G236>change<s%> my <S%G5456>tone,<s%> for I <S%G639>am<s%> <S%G639>perplexed<s%> <S%G1722>about<s%> you.
<S%G3004>Tell<s%> me, you who <S%G2309>want<s%> to be <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> do you not <S%G191>listen<s%> to the <S%G3551>law<s%>?

For it is <S%G1125>written<s%> that <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5207>sons,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> by the <S%G3814>bondwoman<s%> and <S%G1520>one<s%> by the <S%G1658>free<s%> <S%G1658>woman.<s%>

But the son by the <S%G3814>bondwoman<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> and the son by the <S%G1658>free<s%> <S%G1658>woman<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1860>promise.<s%>

<S%G3748>This<s%> is <S%G238>allegorically<s%> <S%G238>speaking:<s%> for <S%G3778>these<s%> [women] are <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1242>covenants,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> [proceeding] from <S%G3735>Mount<s%> <S%G4614>Sinai<s%> <S%G1080>bearing<s%> <S%G1080>children<s%> who are to be <S%G1397>slaves;<s%> she is <S%G28>Hagar.<s%>

<S%G3568>Now<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G28>Hagar<s%> is <S%G3735>Mount<s%> <S%G4614>Sinai<s%> in <S%G688>Arabia,<s%> and <S%G4960>corresponds<s%> to the <S%G3568>present<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> for she is in <S%G1398>slavery<s%> with her <S%G5043>children.<s%>
But the <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G507>above<s%> is <S%G1658>free;<s%> she is our <S%G3384>mother.<s%>

For it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2165>"Rejoice,<s%> <S%G4723>barren<s%> <S%G4723>woman<s%> who does not <S%G5088>bear;<s%> <S%G4486>Break<s%> <S%G4486>forth<s%> and <S%G994>shout,<s%> you who are not in <S%G5605>labor;<s%> For <S%G4183>more<s%> are the <S%G5043>children<s%> of the <S%G2048>desolate<s%> <S%G2228>Than<s%> of the one who <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G435>husband.<s%>"
And you <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G2596>like<s%> <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> are <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G1860>promise.<s%>

But as at that <S%G5119>time<s%> he who was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> him [who was born] <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> it is <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

But <S%G5101>what<s%> does the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%>? <S%G1544>"Cast<s%> out the <S%G3814>bondwoman<s%> and her <S%G5207>son,<s%> For the <S%G5207>son<s%> of the <S%G3814>bondwoman<s%> shall not be an <S%G2816>heir<s%> with the <S%G5207>son<s%> of the <S%G1658>free<s%> <S%G1658>woman.<s%>"
<S%G1352>So<s%> <S%G1352>then,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> we are not <S%G5043>children<s%> of a <S%G3814>bondwoman,<s%> but of the <S%G1658>free<s%> <S%G1658>woman.<s%>
